solution_line_template: Johnny TV makes {percentage_more}*{lj_productions_movies_per_year}=<<{percentage_more}*{lj_productions_movies_per_year}={johnny_tv_additional_movies}>>{johnny_tv_additional_movies} more movies than L&J Productions each year.
